Posts.Content: I will move to Riyadh, Saudi Arabia very soon.  I need some help and information where I can buy CMD (Concentrated Mineral Drops) in Riyadh?  I have been using it just before I started my chemo and I feel it helped a lot in stabilizing my system despite of the toxicity of the treatment.
Posts.Title: concentrated mineral drops in Riyadh?

Posts.Content: I need help!!!! Any info where i can buy concentrated mineral drops in Riyadh, k.s.a. It is also referred as ionic mineral drops sourced from Lake Utah, Nevada USA.  Help pls.
